mapper.insert: INSERT into textbook_order(orderDetailID,orderid,courseID, teacherID,orderNum) SELECT t1.arrange_course_id, t4.orderid,t1.course_code, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(teacher_number) FROM ap_teacher_course t2 WHERE t1.arrange_course_id=t2.arrange_course_id)teacher_number,t1.major_students_number FROM ap_task_arrange_course t1,ap_arrange_course_task t3,textbookorderinfo t4 WHERE t1.arrange_task_id=t3.arrange_task_id AND t3.major_name=t4.roomName AND t3.academic_year=t4.yearNum AND t3.term=t4.semester AND t3.task_receipt_name=t4.createPerson AND t4.remark1 IS NULL
